arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)

	for i, idStatue in pairs(T_STATUES) do
		Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(idStatue, false)
	end
	
	for i=1, #T_STATUES do
		if T_STATUES[i] == idActorGizmo then
--			nCurrentActiveStatueIndex = i
			nStartingStatueIndex = i
			break
		end
	end
	
	for i, playerID in pairs(Hydra.QuestGetParticipants()) do
		Hydra.ActorPlayDisembodiedConversation(CONV_INTRO, playerID)
	end

end

function Start(flGameTime)

--	nHeartBeatCount = nHeartBeatCount + 1
	
--	if nHeartBeatCount == 10 then
--		startNextStatue(true)
--	end
	
end

function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)

	local tStatuesActive = Hydra.ActorsInPrefabScopedGroup(PSAG_ACTIVE_STATUES)
	
	if #tStatuesActive <= 0 then
		return
	end
	
	for i, activeStatueID in pairs(tStatuesActive) do
		if Hydra.ActorDistanceBetweenActors(idActorKilled, activeStatueID) - Hydra.ActorGetRadius(idActorKilled) <= N_STATUE_RANGE then
			statueChargedFX(idActorKilled, activeStatueID)
			
			local nMinPoints = 4
--			local monsterFamily = string.lower(Hydra.ActorGetMonsterFamily(idActorKilled))
			-- NG: Due to the way fallen spawn (reduced numbers to allow resurrections) 
			-- I am increasing min points per fallen kill to 5 to help with the mastery
--			if string.find(monsterFamily, "fallen") then
--				nMinPoints = 6
--			end
			-- cf: commenting out NGs work since spawners no longer count dead fallen as active
			
			local nScore = math.max(nMinPoints, math.ceil(Hydra.ActorGetHitPointsMax(idActorKilled) * 4))
			addChargeToChargeable(activeStatueID, nScore)
		end
	end
end

function Start(idActorChargeable)
	Hydra.Wait(0.5) -- Wait to avoid race condition
	if STATUES_COMPLETED == 2 then
		Hydra.QuestAdvancePhase()
	end
end

arQuestPhases.szOnEnterScript:
for i, spawnerID in pairs(T_SPAWNERS) do
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(spawnerID) then
		Hydra.ActorEnable(spawnerID)
	end
end


local idCurrentStatue = T_STATUES[nStartingStatueIndex]
--Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(POWER_STATUE, "STATUE_WARMUP", idCurrentStatue)

for i, statue in ipairs(T_STATUES) do -- needs to be in order
	Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(POWER_STATUE, "STATUE_WARMUP", statue)
--	tStatuesNotFull[#tStatuesNotFull+1] = statueID
end

--Hydra.Wait(3)

--statueChargedFX(ID_CORPSE, idCurrentStatue)
--addChargeToChargeable(idCurrentStatue, 10) -- free charge to teach mechanic

Hydra.Wait(.5)

--play monster spawn sfx
Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(ID_THIS_QUEST, EG_SFX_MONSTERSPAWN)
arQuestPhases.szOnExitScript:
for i, statueID in pairs(Hydra.ActorsInPrefabScopedGroup(PSAG_ACTIVE_STATUES)) do
	Hydra.BuffRemove(POWER_STATUE, "STATUE_ACTIVE", statueID)
end

for i, spawnerID in pairs(T_SPAWNERS) do
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(spawnerID) then
		Hydra.ActorDisable(spawnerID)
	end
end

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start()
	local sChest = ACTOR_CHEST_REWARD

	if Hydra.QuestGetBonusPhaseResult() then
		sChest = ACTOR_CHEST_REWARD_HEROIC
	end
	
	Events.SpawnRewardChest(CHEST_LOCATION, sChest)
end

arQuestPhases.szOnEnterScript:
if Hydra.QuestGetBonusPhaseResult() then
	-- Spawn super elite if the bonus was achieved
	Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(ID_SUPER_ELITE, 8)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(ID_SUPER_ELITE, EG_BURST_BLOOD)
	Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdate(ID_SUPER_ELITE)
end

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActorChargeable)

	local idStatue = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorChargeable, "statue")[1]
	TableRemove(tStatuesNotFull, idStatue)
	Hydra.ActorRemoveFromPrefabScopedGroup(idStatue, PSAG_ACTIVE_STATUES)
	
	Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(POWER_STATUE, "STATUE_SPAWN_ELITE", idStatue)
	Hydra.QActorWait(idActorChargeable, 0.3)
	Hydra.QActorDelete(idActorChargeable)
	Hydra.ActorKill(idStatue)
	
	STATUES_COMPLETED = STATUES_COMPLETED + 1
	
end

function Start(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawner)
	Hydra.Wait(1.5)
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idActorSpawned) then
		Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(POWER_STATUE, "ELITE_SPAWNED", idActorSpawned)
	end
	
end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)
-- this event is sent by the power
	Hydra.ActorAddToPrefabScopedGroup(idActor, PSAG_ACTIVE_STATUES)

	
end

szUserFunctionsScript:
local function statueChargedFX(idActorKilled, idStatue)

	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroupActorToActor(idActorKilled, idStatue, EG_ROPE_CHARGED)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idActorKilled, EG_DEATH_CHARGED)
	Hydra.ActorFadeAndDelete(idActorKilled, 3)
	Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(POWER_STATUE, "STATUE_CHARGED", idStatue)
	
end

local function addChargeToChargeable(idStatue, nScore)
	local idChargeable = T_CHARGEABLES[idStatue]
	Hydra.ChargeableGizmoSetProgress(idChargeable, math.min(100, Hydra.ChargeableGizmoGetProgress(idChargeable) + nScore))
end
szOnStartupScript:
-- Event Specific Data
	ID_THIS_QUEST = Hydra.QuestGetOwner()

	N_STATUE_RANGE = 6
	PSAG_ACTIVE_STATUES = "LE_Altar_Active_Statues"
	
	STATUES_COMPLETED = 0
	
	tStatuesNotFull = {}
	T_CHARGEABLES = {}
	nHeartBeatCount = 0
	
--	iStatueOne = Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, #T_STATUES)
--	iStatueTwo = Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, #T_STATUES)
	
--	if iStatueOne == iStatueTwo then
--		iStatueTwo = iStatueTwo + 1
		
--		if iStatueTwo > #T_STATUES then
--			T_STATUES = 1
--		end
--	end
	
	for i, statueID in ipairs(T_STATUES) do -- needs to be in order
		T_CHARGEABLES[statueID] = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(statueID, "Progress")[1]
		tStatuesNotFull[#tStatuesNotFull+1] = statueID
	end
	
--	nCurrentActiveStatueIndex = 1

	nStartingStatueIndex = 1	
	nChargeableScoreProgressTotal = 100
